about_the_game:
Battle Life Online is a unique combination of multiplayer FPS / TPS shooter, racing game and life sim.
In short: PvP-RP

You have the option to choose one of 4 factions (civilians / cops / rebels / tech), with different clothing, vehicles, weapons, special abilities and options.

All this in a freely drivable and walkable Open-World with different climates.

- Explore the +64km² island, which is divided into 4 different climate zones. Whether lush meadows, dense forests, vast deserts or hot tropics, there is plenty to do and discover while interacting with other real people.

- For this, you get many different vehicles at your disposal, to get fast and "safe?", from A to B, to attain your objectives.

- Go your way as an outlaw or take part in adventures and events together with your friends in a group.

- Experience a unique and dynamic open world PvP-system, which leads to tense situations.

Are you a helpful savior of those in need?
Or the rebel who knows no mercy?
It's up to you.

Civilians, Rebels, Cops, Techs, Weapons, Cars and the dear Money...

Collect / Fight / Earn / Win
detailed_description:
Battle Life Online is a unique combination of multiplayer FPS / TPS shooter, racing game and life sim.
In short: PvP-RP

You have the option to choose one of 4 factions (civilians / cops / rebels / tech), with different clothing, vehicles, weapons, special abilities and options.

All this in a freely drivable and walkable Open-World with different climates.

- Explore the +64km² island, which is divided into 4 different climate zones. Whether lush meadows, dense forests, vast deserts or hot tropics, there is plenty to do and discover while interacting with other real people.

- For this, you get many different vehicles at your disposal, to get fast and "safe?", from A to B, to attain your objectives.

- Go your way as an outlaw or take part in adventures and events together with your friends in a group.

- Experience a unique and dynamic open world PvP-system, which leads to tense situations.

Are you a helpful savior of those in need?
Or the rebel who knows no mercy?
It's up to you.

Civilians, Rebels, Cops, Techs, Weapons, Cars and the dear Money...

Collect / Fight / Earn / Win

name: Battle Life Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64 bit) / Windows® 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce® GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard-Sound / Microphone
  • Additional Notes: SATA-3-SSD // Note: The game is in Early Access and the minimum requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64 bit) / Windows® 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce® RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Headset
  • Additional Notes: M.2-NVMe-SSD
